name: Tender Bar
description:
Welcome to Tender Bar! In this game, you play as a Bartender who is trying to serve everyone a drink.

Controls: WASD - move Left Mouse Button - Pickup, put down, interact with customers’ order, buying upgrades

How to play: You start with 90 health, 2 pickup slots, 1 money/drink, and 0.19 speed. Through serving drinks, you will get money (represented by beer icon). You can by upgrades in the vending machines in the room behind the counter.

Customers will enter every 10 seconds, don’t let them wait! They will give you bad reviews.

Notable bugs: These will be fixed in the next patch (if there is one).

  • The collider detection of drinks are inconsistent, sometimes you can put down but not pick back up, sometimes you cant pick them up at all (ex. beer).
  • After a customer finishes their drink, they will ask for more, but you can’t interact with them.
  • There is no gameover menu
  • There is no restart function
  • Sprites of customers overlapping
